name: The Boy Who Typed Wolf
description: Explore a real unsolved mystery dating back to antiquity. The Boy Who Typed Wolf is a point & click adventure game filled with unique puzzles, intriguing clues and dark secrets, all based on real events and mythology. Can you solve this enigma?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
